snippet.title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Be’lakor | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
On June 14th, players across all platforms will receive the new Be’lakor update. It is a free update to the Chaos Wastes game mode, and below you will find more information about the new content. 
https://bit.ly/3ahoi6j

-- Follow us!  -- Click the link and find the platform you're looking for!
https://linktr.ee/PlayVermintide
https://linktr.ee/Fatshark

Buy now: https://bit.ly/BuyVermintide
